message: Still trying to figure out how you two managed to keep calm with our pranks and stupidity 🧐.
To many more amazing trips and adventures...
The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret. But, whatever you two are doing is working.
Because of you both, the world knows that truth and love exist. Keep these beliefs alive and cherish one another.
The only thing better than having you for parents is my children having you for grandparents.
May it be giving away blankets on new year or distributing meals on my birthday, you are always someone we look upto.
Esa lag rha hai papa ko jabardasti khaada kar diya gaya hai 😂😂.
Thank you for all the late night checks when we forgot to call.
